Title: Major clades in Solanum based on ndhF sequence data.
Abstract:
Analysis of sequence data from the chloroplast gene ndhF
identifies at least twelve major well-supported clades within the genus
Solanum. These are briefly described, given informal clade names, and
compared with the groups recognized by previous Solanum workers.
Non-molecular synapomorphies are proposed for many of the clades.
Continued use of informal taxonomic designations is advocated for new
infrageneric groups within Solanum.
